overview: The Offspring at Cidade do Rock, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil on September 24, 2017. Setlist: You're Gonna Go Far, Kid / All I Want / Come Out and Play / (Can't Get My) Head Around You / Original Prankster / Have You Ever / Staring at the Sun / Want You Bad / Bad Habit / Hit That / Gone Away / Why Don't You Get a Job? / Americana / Pretty Fly (For a White Guy) / The Kids Aren't Alright / Self Esteem
title: The Offspring - Rock in Rio 2017
